mapper.select: WITH user_qna AS ( select "" as CMT_NO, B.QA_NO, B.NICKNAME, B.TITLE, CASE WHEN (B.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, B.CONTENT, B.PW, B.CREATE_DATE, B.ANSWER, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.HIT, B.IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM users U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME ), user_cmt as ( select B.CMT_NO, B.QA_NO, "관리자" as NICKNAME, "└ 답변 작성" as TITLE, CASE WHEN (B.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, B.CMT_CONTENT, "" as PW, B.CREATE_DATE, "" as ANSWER, B.MODIFY_DATE, "" as HIT, B.IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM users U INNER JOIN Q_CMT B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME WHERE B.STATE = '1' ) select sum(b.cnt) as cnt from (select count(*) as cnt from user_qna UNION ALL select count(*) as cnt from user_cmt) b
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Q_BOARD WHERE PW = #{pw} AND QA_NO = #{qaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Q_BOARD (QA_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, PW, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP, ANSWER) VALUES (#{qaNo}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pw}, NOW(), NOW(), 0, #{ip}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QA_NO, U.NICKNAME as nickname, Q.TITLE as title, Q.CONTENT as content, Q.PW as pw, Q.CREATE_DATE, Q.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, Q.HIT as hit, Q.IP as ip, Q.ANSWER as answer FROM USERS U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD Q ON U.NICKNAME = Q.NICKNAME WHERE Q.QA_NO = #{qaNo}

WITH user_qna AS ( select "" as CMT_NO, B.QA_NO, B.NICKNAME, B.TITLE, CASE WHEN (B.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, B.CONTENT, B.PW, B.CREATE_DATE, B.ANSWER, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.HIT, B.IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM users U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME ), user_cmt as ( select B.CMT_NO, B.QA_NO, "관리자" as NICKNAME, "└ 답변 작성" as TITLE, CASE WHEN (B.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, B.CMT_CONTENT, "" as PW, B.CREATE_DATE, "" as ANSWER, B.MODIFY_DATE, "" as HIT, B.IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM users U INNER JOIN Q_CMT B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME WHERE B.STATE = '1' ) (select * from user_qna) UNION ALL (select * from user_cmt) ORDER BY QA_NO DESC, CMT_NO ASC LIMIT #{begin}, #{end}
